transArray.content: The hotel has complete facilities, the items are very new, the toiletries all have a light orange smell, very fresh, the room is very clean and tidy, the service is warm and thoughtful, there is a bus stop right outside the door, it is convenient to travel, and the University of International Business and Economics is opposite the hotel. I will stay there next time Choose this hotel!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for your choice and recognition. Winning the trust and favor of our guests is the principle of hospitality we have always adhered to. To get your favor and such a powerful reply is our greatest support! We are looking forward to meeting you again, and wish you a happy life!
